welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shinagawa-ku, a vibrant and bustling neighborhood known for its historic temples, beautiful gardens, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the unique charm of our city. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network after registering with a valid email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport is used for military and government flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
